You were rushing in the halls towards the bathroom. One of the kids had put a laxative in your lunch. You almost reached the door when the pain made you collapse to your knees. The only chance you had was to crawl to the bathroom. You opened the door and headed to an empty stall. Your body gave up and let loose in your pants. You can feel the warm slime like fluid flow down your pants. Suddenly, someone opened the main door to the bathroom. You turned around and saw it was Mike, the only other guy at this place.

"I guess you didn't pay attention to the rules." he said as he knelt down. He grabbed you by the waist and carried you outside to the changing tables. Mike laid you down on one and strapped you on to make sure you don't get out He ripped off your khaki pants and checkered briefs. He threw the poop covered clothing in the trash and reached in the cabinet below. It was a syringe with a bright blue liquid. He struck you with this liquid on the arm, and boy did it hurt. You let out a painful howl, followed by the howl getting higher and higher toned. You saw that your body hair was receding into your skin. Then everything around the room got larger and larger till it stopped. Mike tightened the restraints to keep you laid down. He reached down in the cabinet for something else.

"Why are you doing this to me Mike? I thought we were friends?" you said in a high toned voice.

"We are, but rules are rules." he said with a faint echo as his head was in the cabinet looking for something. "Ahh, here it is."

Mike pulled out what looked like some wipes and baby powder. Then he pulled out a blue and white diaper with babyish characters on it. He wiped your bottom clean and lifted your bottom. Mike then slid the diaper under you and laid your bottom back down. He powdered your private areas and taped the diaper on.

Once upon a time there was a 30-year-old man who was quite lucky apart from his rather unfortunate name John Doe.

He used to be a cheerleader in high school, now he coached some high school cheerleaders.
One day, he was in the middle of practice, when one of the cheerleaders called out, "Mr Doe, did you wet your pants?!"
And indeed he did, there was a huge wet spot on his pants and the floor but he hadn't even felt himself peeing!

He went backstage and changed, and cleaned up the spot on the floor and tried to pretend it never happened, but the cheerleaders couldn't help but whisper among themselves.

After practice, John was wondering why he could have wet his pants when Taylor bounded in, saying "Mr Doe!" enthusiastically.
Taylor was 17, and the captain of the cheerleaders and she was easily the most active student.
"Hello, Taylor, what do you want?" said John, as Taylor bounced up and down, her blonde braid bobbing up and down with each bounce.
"I want you to follow me!" said Taylor.

Once upon a time, there was a 25-year-old man named Dave Brown.

He was very happy because he'd been dating this old school friend Jenny for years now and had just moved into her house and they were going to get married in one week's time.
They'd made all the arrangements and negotiated everything, there was just one thing they couldn't quite agree on.
Jenny really wanted to start a family.
She'd been talking about it for a while now, but Dave wasn't so sure.
He wanted kids, but didn't want them yet. He thought maybe he should wait for a few months or even a year or two so he could read up on parenting.

One day, he went home from work to find the living room transformed.
There was a crib in the corner, a stroller in another corner, and all over the floor were various diapers, pacifiers, blankies, baby clothes, bibs, baby dishes, baby bottles, baby spoons, containers of baby food and formula and a changing table.
"Jenny," said Dave, "you know I don't feel ready yet....are you expecting?!" he said, knowing that he and Jenny hadn't taken any chastity pledges and so Jenny might have been pregnant.

What does Jenny do?
114.title: Dave Brown

121.content: Lucy Harrision was your average 14 year old girl in most respects. She was in eight grade, about to enter high school. She hung out with friends and went to the movies, went shopping....normal teenage things. But she was alone among her friends in one respect. She wanted to remain a child. She had always had these feelings but now that she was about to enter high school, they were much stronger. There was no doubt she was getting older. No more middle school, she was to be a high school student. She envied her 6 year old sister, Jessica, who was still in kindergarten. In fact, she would often play dolls or house with her sister and her friends instead of going out. She was considered a "big little girl" jokingly by her sister's friends and accepted as just another playmate. They even made her try on her sister's nightgown that used to be hers when she herself was 6. They all got a good laugh but she almost cried since she had missed that nightgown so much. She was still small for her age, but not significantly smaller than the other girls and she certainly wasn't the smallest. She did, however, still have her little girl cuteness, which had yet to mature into a woman's figure. She often wanted to be the little sister. To be even younger than her sister. She wasn't sure what to do. But she had to do something. Jessica came skipping into Lucy's room one Sunday morning and jumped on her bed to wake her. "Hiya sis! Mornin! Hey, you wanna go play at the park today?! Please! My friends and I wanna go and mommy said it'd be ok if you took us!" She looked over at her clock. It was just about to turn 8:00. She yawned. "Jessica, how do you get up so early and have so much energy?" Jessica just smiled, "I've been up watching cartoons since 7. Mommy said you usedta be the same when you were little." Lucy realized that was true. Where had her youthful energy and anticipation for a brand new day gone? She sighed. "Alright little girl. Get dressed and I'll take you guys." Jessica smiled and kissed her sister before hopping off her bed and running down the hall to tell her friends who had slept over the night before. She didn't have much time to dress or eat since the girls were all hurrying her. She threw on a sundress and combed her hair and managed to grab a banana before she was pushed out the door. She joined the 6 year olds in holding hands and skipping down the sidewalk to the park

They only leaked once at night and one time when she was in the car seat riding home. So all in all not too bad. She felt herself using diapers more easily now and felt that her control was slowly going. She couldn't hold it as long (as she tried a few times when she was afraid her diaper would leak in a public place) and she felt herself peeing less and less. This made the teen feel happy. Pooping was different. She KNEW that was coming. And so did everyone else around as she had to assume a toddlerish spread-legged squatting stance to go. But she did it none the less. Her mother was getting her pampers any day now once she ran out of huggies and she couldn't wait. She wanted to be free of the fear of leaking. In the meantime, they had been out shopping. Lucy's wardrobe was now much more childish. Those that were too small were altered by her mother, who Lucy thought of as a master seamstress. To Lucy's surprise, a package came one day she thought it may have been toys, but turned out to be something entirely different. Her mother smiled widely at the box and then turned and kissed Lucy affectionately on the head. "Oh, I have some surprises for my little one! You are going to look so adorable! Not that you aren't adorable now!" Lucy was standing there in a cute dress with little hearts on it and trying to peer into any small opening the box had very childike. "Mommy, what is it huh?" Her mother just smiled and lead her daughter up to her room where she opened the box and took out the cutest outfits Lucy had ever seen. They were obviously for very little girls but also seemed to be in her size. They were frilly and had bows all over them and some even came with frilly diaper covers as they were toddler style and would show off the diaper. There were party dresses and play dresses and sunsuits and other childish clothing. "Sweetie, I found these on the internet and got them in your size. These are real toddler and little girl style clothes that I though you might like. But whenever you wear them is up to you. Just when you are comfortable ok angel?" She ran up and hugged her mother, "Thank you mommy! They are so pretty! Can I try one on now please please please?!" Her mother giggled and nodded. Lucy ran over to the laid out outfits and chose a pink dress. It was a little girl's party dress and was very frilly and puffy and soft. Her mother smiled and got the teen undressed down to her diaper. She checked Lucy's diaper and after confirming she was still dry she dressed her. Afterwards, she stood back and smiled. "You look so precious Lucy!" She hugged her daughter and followed her downstairs as she skipped away to show Jessica. "Jessie Jessie! Lookit what mommy got me!" Her sister walked out of the kitchen and had to catch the excited Lucy, "Calm down lil sis! Wow you're excited! But look how pretty you are! Such a sweetie!" She hugged Lucy and took her hand and lead her into the kitchen to eat the pb+j sandwiches she had made for them both.
121111111111111.title: Continue 1

1211111111111111.content:
After Jessica washed Lucy's sticky hands, the rest of the day was spent modeling the new clothes her mother had gotten her. During this time, both Jessica and mom noticed that the teen was getting much more into being a little girl again. She was less restrained and her mother made note of it. She wasn't even really embarrassed about showing her diapers. Of course this was only around family at the moment. They both hoped that her attitude would transfer to the outside world as well. The only thing that worried mom was that she didn't want her daughter to be made fun of. She didn't think that her behavior would be a problem, or her childish clothes for that matter. She could pass as younger than she really was without a problem. The only problem was the diaper and the very very young looking clothes she was now modeling. These might bring teasing. However she did have a plan if Lucy ever brought up wearing those clothes outside. As for the diaper, it didn't really show much really. But dresses and skirts would still be fine. She was brought out of her thoughts as Lucy jumped into her lap and gave her a hug. Mom held her close and gave her a kiss on the forehead. She loved her little girl.

The next day was the first time Lucy woke up wet without knowing she peed during the night. Kind of. She was half awake when it happened. Her mind didn't register fully what she was doing. She felt a pressure and something puffier between her legs than her panties. She let go without really thinking and went back to sleep. So it was half-without knowing it. This got her in a good mood since she felt more like the little girl she was acting and being treated like. She almost had her first real accident in her sleep! Her mother was thankful that Lucy had thought to protect the mattress with a plastic cover after she started wetting again. She mentally reprimanded herself for being stupid and reminded herself to tell Lucy that she was a good girl for thinking of the matress cover. Still, she didn't blame Lucy. After all, her little girl couldn't help it as far as she knew. And this was actually closer to the truth now. The teen's mother let her daughter pick out what to wear today. Lucy decided to wear shorts that day. They were all going to the beach today anyway so shorts seemed appropriate.
1211111111111111.title: Continue 1

12111111111111111.content: The three of them arrived at the the beach and of course the two girls wanted to get right to the sand to play. They dragged their mother along and she couldn't help but smile. She loved Lucy being this way again. She was no longer stressed about acting mature and her little girl side was taking over her actions again. She was just like Jessica and sometimes even more so, "Especially when it comes to the potty," Catherine thought with a slight smile as she noted the very slight diaper bulge in Lucy's shorts. Once they got there, Lucy was the first to be jumping up and down, asking to go play. "Sweetie we need to get you all nice and ready first ok? You need sunblock to keep from getting burnt and I need to get your bathing suit on. Come on angel, we have to go to bathroom over there to get changed." Lucy nodded and took her mother's hand which was surprising to Catherine. She noticed that Lucy was acting younger today than usual. She was actually happy about this since it meant that the teen less self-conscious about her new youngest-child-in-diapers role. Jessica took hold of Lucy's free hand and they all walked toward the bathroom. Inside the ladies room, Jessica went off on her own to change into her suit right away and Catherine was about to do the same when she felt a little tug. She turned around and noticed Lucy looking a bit nervous. "What is it angel?" Lucy looked at her and asked, "Mommy, I need to be changed too! Don't leave me alone!" Catherine only needed a minute to realize that Lucy was really into her role and didn't want to be left alone and needed help changing. She smiled, "I'm sorry sweetie! I didn't know you wanted mommy's help. Come with me." She didn't wait for the teen this time and took her daughter's hand. There was a changing area but Catherine didn't want to show off her daughter's diapers to everyone there so she began to lead Lucy into the handicapped stall so she had enough room to change her. Lucy pulled on her hand and Catherine stopped. The red-faced teen finally managed to say, "Mommy it's ok. I wanna change in the changing room. That's where you are supposed ta change and I'm just little so it's ok for me to be in diapers right mommy? All the other little girls in diapers are being dressed in there." She looked down at her feet but her mother lifted her head with her hand so they were eye to eye. "I'm really happy that you are not afraid to be little again but I don't want to embarrass you honey. Don't do this for me. Only for you. Do you really want to change there? I won't lie to you angel, people will probably see you and even though you are a little girl they don't see that. They see a big girl in diapers which they might see as strange. But I will also make sure to check for people in our neighborhood before I start to change you so no one will know who you are. Are you still alright with this?" Lucy thought a little and finally nodded. Catherine smiled and lead her back to the changing area. "My big girl is finally growing down!" she thought to herself and couldn't help but let out a small giggle.
12111111111111111.title: Continue 1

121111111111111111.content: Jessica was a little surprised when she saw her sister come into the changing room with her mother, both of whom were still not changed. Of course once her mother winked at her and started taking Lucy's shoes off for her, Jessica understood and let out a big smile, running over to her sister. "Hiya little sis! Ready to go out and play soon?" She tickled Lucy and made her giggle. Catherine smiled as she pulled Lucy's shirt over her head. She didn't see anyone she knew, but noticed already the confused stares coming her way no doubt because the other women were wondering why a 14 year old needed help undressing. She was a little worried for her daughter ,but knew they would never see these people again. Soon the teen was just in her shorts and a diaper. Catherine whispered, "You ready Lucy?" Lucy nodded and so her mother unzipped her shorts and brought them down, fully exposing the diaper. There were some very confused looks, but no one was rude enough to say anything to Catherine's relief. She was glad the diaper was dry at least. She got out the new extra-cute one-piece suit she had bought for Lucy and put it on her. The diaper was obvious through the suit, but Lucy no longer seemed to care. She was smiling in anticipation of going out to play. Her mother finished with a kiss to the teen's forehead, "Ok, I have to change now, but you girls can go back to our beach umbrella and blanket we set up to play. Jessica watch Lucy and both of you STAY RIGHT THERE until I come back ok? Good girls! Have fun!" They tore out of the changing area and got back to the umbrella in record time. Lucy and Jessica began making a sandcastle and when there mother returned, she took out a little sippy cup and gave it to Lucy. "Here is some apple juice sweetie! Drink it so you don't get too hot and get all thirsty!" Lucy smiled at how childish she was being treated and began to take sips in between patting sand down onto the sand-mound that was to be a castle. Suddenly, they heard "Catherine! Is that you and your girls? What a surprise!" A woman carrying an umbrella followed closely by a sweet looking toddler girl and an older teenage girl approached. "Cindy! How are you! It's been so long! I haven't seen you since you moved away 2 years ago! Wow! Ashley and Samantha have really grown! How old are they now?" The other woman smiled and said, "Ashley just had her 16th birthday and Samantha here is 3. Your girls are looking good as well!" Catherine nodded, "Jessica is 6 and Lucy is 14." As they were talking, little Samantha walked over to Lucy and Jessica and Ashley followed her little sister keeping an eye out for her. She plopped down beside Lucy and smiled at her, "Can I help too?" Lucy smiled and said of course she could. "Hold on there Sammie-girl. Let me change you first." Ashley picked Samantha up off the group and took off her dress and replaced it with a cute pink t-shirt that was worn and obviously for play purposes only. Her diaper showed from under the shirt since she wasn't wearing anything else. She knelt down and began to help before stopping and looking at Lucy.
121111111111111111.title: Continue 1

1211111111111111111.content: "I like your bathing suit! It's really pretty!" The teen smiled and thanked her. "Let's be friends k? I know you're really little like me, but I've never seen such a big girl in diapers before. That's ok though but you should try no suit 'cause it's more comfy. See like me!" She pointed to her exposed diaper, giggled, and went back to work, not paying any more attention and apparently not fazed about Lucy's diapers. Ashley and Cindy both overheard and noticed what they overlooked before. Catherine, didn't you say Lucy was 14? Why is she still in diapers?" Ashley walked over too, still keeping an eye on the kids but wanting to hear what the explaination was." Catherine knew this would come out eventually and so she wasn't taken by surprise, "Well, Lucy recently began to start having accidents again and they kept getting worse and worse. I am sure she is like your Samatha in her control right now. Were not sure how she lost control. She seems to like being treated like a little girl again and I am glad to do it if that's what makes her happy." Catherine paused and Cindy smiled, "Well I don't have any problem with it. It isn't hurting anyone and if she needs them there isn't much you can do. I do have to say that she is rather cute looking like that though!" They both laughed and Ashley went back over to the kids. "Lucy honey, come here would you?" The teen had been nervously watching the others and walked over with Samantha in tow. Jessica followed, ready to defend her sister. "Don't worry sweetheart! No one here cares that you wear diapers! I don't like seeing cute little girls looking all sad ok? I know like my little sister that you are like her and can't help it. Besides, you look adorable! In fact, I can tell you are a bit uncomfy in that suit and diaper. Why don't you let me dress you like Samantha? I have an extra shirt we brought that should fit you perfectly. It's an old one of mine. Ok?" Samantha jumped up and down, "Yeah yeah! We can be twins! Please Lucy?!" Lucy nodded happily and Jessica smiled at her 'little' sister. Ashley grinned, "Ok angel! Oh, and I am going to treat you just like Samantha which I am sure is ok with you so feel free to come to me if your mommy is busy and I will change you or dry you or anything else you need. Ok little one?" Lucy nodded and ran up and hugged Ashley, "Aww! You are SOOOO cute! Ok now hold still!" She took off Lucy's suit and slipped a shirt over her head. Now her diaper was showing just like Samantha's. She thanked Ashley and ran back over to play along with Samantha and Jessica. Ashley went over and explained what she did to Catherine who thought it was cute and didn't mind at all if Lucy had no problem with it. Soon, Samantha and Lucy were both wet since they both kept getting apple juice from Catherine who had brought an extra sippy cup that she gave to Samantha. They went to get changed. Ashley insisted on changing them both since she though Lucy was adorable. She taped up the teen and patted her diaper, "All set kiddo!" Lucy giggled and went back to playing.

12111111111111111111.content: The day at the beach was going really well for all involved. Lucy and Samantha were getting along wonderfully. They were very alike and Samantha accepted Lucy as her little kid equal with no questions. Of course since Lucy was in reality relearning what it was like to be a little girl, she began to copy Samantha which every thought was cute. Cindy was happy since Lucy was really Samantha's first friend. Since they were moving back into the area because of her divorce from her husband, she even volunteered to babysit for Lucy and talked of play dates for the kids. Ashley was also loving another little girl to play with. The only one feeling rather left out was Jessica. She played with her sister, but felt a little neglected now that Lucy had a new friend and was getting a lot of attention. At one point, she even excused herself to go to the bathroom and instead went behind the building and cried. She loved having a little sister and was happy for her, so she was kind of mad at herself for being upset. However, she was only 6 and she couldn't help but feel left out. She even thought for a second that she should start having accidents too to get attention from everyone and so her sister would play with her more. Then she remembered that she hated diapers and feeling wet and messy, which was why she was so adamant about not being put back in diapers when she began peeing her pants again as a 4 year old. She thus pushed the idea aside. She would hate diapers. But still, she wanted to be close to her sister. Suddenly, she heard her sister's voice calling her and crying. "Jessica, Jessi! *sniff* Big sis! Where are you!" She was running around crying and drawing attention to herself and her diaper. She didn't care however. Jessica then realized how long she had been there. She came out and ran to her sister, "I'm here Lucy, I'm here! What's wrong honey?" Then teen latched onto her, "I was so scared when I couldn't find you! I want to play with you and thought you left! I love you sister! Don't leave!" Jessica then realized that she was just being selfish and only saw the negatives. She had been playing with her sister. Jessica began crying herself, telling her sister that she was a good girl and the best little sister ever and how sorry she was. Needless to say, they both went back, everyone happy again. Jessica told herself to stop being stupid and just have fun.
12111111111111111111.title: Continue 1

121111111111111111111.content: By the end of the day, Lucy and Samantha had become attached to each other and didn't want to go. They did so under many tears but cheered up again when they were told that they could play together often if they wanted. Catherine buckled Lucy up into the new car seat she got her and kissed her forehead, "You were a good girl today sweetheart! You played with Samantha so well! I think you deserve an ice-cream! And I think Jessica does to for being such a good big sister!" They both shouted happily at the prospect of getting a sweet, delicious treat. On the ride to the ice-cream shop, Catherine hit a pothole, which sent a jolt through the car. Lucy suddenly felt her diaper getting warm. She looked down shocked to know that the bump had made her start wetting without her knowing it. "Soon I really will need diapers," she thought. Jessica noticed her sister's odd expression and immediately felt her diaper to find it wet. "Mom, Lucy wet her diaper and needs changing." Jessica turned red at hearing her sister announce it and said, "I had an accident, sorry mom." Catherine shook her head and laughed, "Lucy, you need to get over that. It's not an accident. The diapers are there so you can use them. You don't use the potty anymore since you need diapers. There is nothing wrong with using them. When you want to be potty trained like your big sister, just let me know, but for now don't worry! Just say, "I'm wet," or even just, "wet!" if you are feeling especially little. Don't be embarrased. Just watch your friend Samantha. She doesn't get all upset and call it an accident. And what happened to my sweet little girl? You sounded more grown up just then." Lucy smiled, "Mommy, I love you!" Catherine smiled, "There she is! Ok honey, I'll change you at home if you want to wait or I can do it when we stop to get ice-cream if you feel icky." Lucy said, "I can wait mommy." Catherine grinned, "Good girl! Okay, here we are!" Jessica helped Lucy out of her car seat and she put on one of her mother's t-shirts so her diaper would be covered. Once they all had a cone, they sat on a bench and started eating. When they finished, Lucy quickly stood up and looked nervous, "Mommy, I hafta....you know." Catherine smiled, "You have to go number two right? Well, I can take you if you want, since you caught it. I can see how you might feel nervous in front of all these....Lucy, where are you going?" The teen suddenly ran behind a big tree out of view. Jessica giggled, "I think she couldn't stop it. I'll go check her." Jessica found Lucy standing like a very embarrased toddler might. She smelled it. "It's ok Lucy. Come on, mommy can change you!" Catherine was already in the van getting a diaper out, "I don't think we can wait anymore sweetie. Hop up." Once Lucy was changed, they headed home. Or so Lucy thought because Catherine realized they just ran out of huggies. Catherine pulled up to a store and parked. She smiled at her daughter. "Lucy, I think it is time to get you some pampers since you ran out huggies. Wait here with your sister alright?" Lucy nodded and her mother went into the store. A few minutes later she came out with a cart full of diaper packages and loaded the car. They then continued on the way home.

1211111111111111111111.content: When they arrived home Jessica brought Lucy by hand up to Lucy's room. Jessica then left and their mother came in carrying the pampers. She looked at Lucy with a smile. "Wanna try one on?" Lucy nodded. Lucy hopped down from her bed and looked over the diapers. They were so nice to the touch and she imagined that they were very comfy to wear. Then she got up and ran to her closet. She returned holding a very cute toddler play dress, some cute socks with ruffles on them, little girl style shoes, and some cute hair clips for her hair. Catherine looked surprised, "You really want the whole treatment don't you angel? Ok then! Arms up sweetie!" She removed Lucy's beach T-shirt and then told her is down on the changing mat. She removed the unused huggie that was not yet dirty and sprinkled some baby powder on the teen. Then she slid the pamper under her daughter and brought the front up, fastening the tapes. While she was still laying down, her mom put on Lucy''s socks and shoes for her, then told her to stand. Lucy felt the diaper between her legs and smiled. It felt wonderful. Her mother slipped the dress over her head and then fixed her hair into a little girl style with the hair clips. Catherine stood back, "You look so sweet Lucy!" She kissed her teen daughter on the cheek and told her to go play while dinner was getting ready. Lucy ran out of the room to find Jessica.

12111111111111111111111.content:
When Lucy got downstairs, a surprise was waiting for her. Samantha ran out of nowhere and gave her a hug. "Hiya Lucy! Guess what?! Mommy said I you could sleep over tonight! Can you can you? PLEEEEASE say yes! Mommy says she knows you are little too n' would be nice to you n' my big sister is gonna be gone n' I wanna have a friend over n' we can watch movies n' please?!!!" Lucy hugged back and started jumping up and down, "Yay! 'Course I wanna come over! Your my new bestest friend after all!" They both jumped around a little while Cindy pulled a confused Catherine to the side, "I'm sorry for barging in like this, but Samantha was so upset about leaving Lucy that I didn't have the heart to turn her down when she asked for a sleepover. I hope it's alright?" Catherine smiled, "Of course! Lucy would love it! And her big sister will be away tonight at a sleepover too so Lucy would be lonely all alone." Cindy smiled, "Great! I just want to make sure with you that it is ok to treat Lucy like a toddler. I don't want to treat her differently from Samantha." Catherine smiled and motioned her teenage daughter to come to her. "Lucy honey. I know you want to sleep over at Samantha's tonight and it's ok with me. But if you do, you can't be a big girl ok? Mrs. Tilman is going to treat you like Samantha which means you will be a 3 year old toddler tonight ok? And you will listen to her." Lucy nodded, "Uh huh mommy! I'll be a good girl!" Catherine kissed her teen daughter and went up to pack some things.
Lucy arrived at Samantha's house and they both immediately ran off to play. Ashley heard the commotion of the two girls and came down. "Wow! Hi there Lucy sweetie! I didn't know you came over to play! You look sooo cute!" Lucy ran over and gave her a quick hug, "Yah, I'm sleepin' over tonight!" Ashley looked down, "Ooooh! Now I want to stay! Wait! Lemme give my friends a call!" Ashley ran out and Lucy shrugged. A few minuted later, Ashely came running back in holding the phone and smiling, "Hey girls! Do you two mind if my friends come over here tonight?! Please?! Mom said it'd be ok if you two don't mind. Lucy, my friends are so sweet and they would love you so you don't have to worry. They'll treat you just like Sammy here." Lucy thought about it, then nodded her approval. "Yay! Big sister's friends are so nice n' they play with me all the time!" Samantha was jumping around. Ashley giggled and told her friends to come over.

121111111111111111111111.content: Lucy had a great night. Ashley wasn't lying. Her friends adored her and they all had so much fun together. They took turns holding her and Samantha in their laps and even cuddled them during the disney movie they watched. Lucy was a little embarassed when she wet her diaper on Ashley's lap, but she was sweet and changed her into another one right away. They didn't even mind when she pooped her diaper. The teen was just treated her like any other toddler. She was so happy. Samantha and Lucy slept together in Samantha's bed that night, snuggled close together. She felt so much like a little girl and in the morning, she didn't even mind when she woke up wet. She was losing control and probably would now wet the bed if she was taken out of them. Even during the day she couldn't hold it long. Soon that would go too. She finally knew that morning when she woke up to a kiss on the forehead and a diaper change by her mother who had come to pick her up that she had what she wanted. She was a little girl again.
121111111111111111111111.title: Continue 1

1211111111111111111111111.content:
14 year old Lucy had been in diapers for the past 2 and a half months. She now was like any other toddler in that she couldn't tell when she needed to pee and wet her diaper without control. The teen had so gotten into her new little girl role that she could no longer even keep from pooping her pants either. The summer had been great for her. Lucy was now totally comfortable acting small outdoors and dressing childishly. Unfortunately, she still had to go to school, and high school was fast approaching. When her mother first gently brought up the subject, Lucy immediately began to cry and ran to Samantha and clung to her, saying that she was going with her best friend to daycare, not high school. She wasn't a big girl anymore, and didn't want to act like one again. Catherine was at a loss of what to do. She doubted any daycare would take Lucy no matter how hard she tried and she still couldn't ignore the fact that Lucy was supposed to start high school either. Realizing that anything short of a miracle, there was nothing that could be done. She knew she would have to force her daughter to go to high school. She hated doing it and Lucy cried for days. But she made it to the first day of school, diaper and all hidden under her clothes. Unfortunately, things did not go well for Lucy.
Lucy wanted badly to go with Samantha to daycare. She and Samantha got together the day school started for breakfast and had a good time until reality came knocking. In a fit of tears, Lucy had to be dragged away from Samantha and upstairs to be changed into more age-appropriate clothes. Catherine told her teen daughter to pick out a dress. Lucy had to wear a skirt or dress in order to hide the diapers. The teen kept pointing to the childish dresses, but her mother had to put her foot down today. Lucy had very much regressed in behavior and was acting so much like a small child that Catherine was worried for her sweet little girl. She didn't want her to be teased. Catherine had to put her foot down no matter how much she hated doing it. "Lucy! Please! Do you want to be teased? I'm sorry honey, but these are the way things have to be. You need to go to school and you can't be little there, honey. It's high school, not daycare. No matter how much you wish, that can't change." Lucy teared up and shot her mother a pleading glance, as if there were something she could do. Catherine almost cried herself, "Honey....I'm sorry. I at least want you to know that if I could make you my little girl full-time all the time again, I would. Here, at least you can wear this cute dress. It's more grown-up, but at least it's still fun. Alright?" Lucy nodded slowly, finally taking it all in. Catherine smiled and lifted her daughter up on the bed to change her into a clean pamper. She chatted while changing the diaper, "Now honey, mommy will come to school during your lunch break to change you. I've told the school that you need to be given medicine and that I will come everyday to give it to you. You should get a permanent lunchtime pass to come see me in the parking lot. I'll change you in the car. Okay hon.?" Lucy nodded. "Good girl. Stand up. Arms to the sky. Good girl! Now sit back down and let mommy get you feetsies ready!" She tickled her daughter's feet and recieved a high pitched giggle. After her shoes and socks were on, Lucy ran downstairs to get a few more minutes playing time with Samantha. Soon, however, they had to leave. The car ride over was long for Lucy. She was dreading going to high school.
1211111111111111111111111.title: Continue 1

12111111111111111111111111.content: Lucy had always been a very friendly girl. However, she was teased a lot because of her kindness and height. Because she moved a lot when her father and mother were still together, she never had a chance to make any real friends. Thus, she didn't really have any friends at all at school. She did have Samantha, but she was at daycare now and Lucy was all alone. As soon as she walked in the door, she got a comment on her "little girl dress" from a bunch of smartly-dressed juniors. Another in her grade laughed and wondered when they started letting kindergarteners into high school.Some even asked if she needed a diaper change, not knowing that they were close to the truth. Her classes were okay, but she hated them and didn't want to learn them. She was just a little girl. Her diaper held up to the wetting she gave it in Algebra and thankfully, no one noticed. In the halls between classes were the worst. She made it to lunch and ran to her mother's waiting car in tears. She said how the others were making fun of her and how she talked and acted and how they were all meanies. Catherine held her close, fearing this would happen. She gently changed her daughter's soaked diaper and noticed that she was sucking her thumb. Catherine smiled and got in the car with her and closed the door. "Sweetie, I have a surprise for you. This will help you relax. Crawl into my lap and lay back. Here, honey, open up." Catherine brought out some jars of soft food and began feeding them to Lucy. Afterwards, she got out a bottle to Lucy's surprise and let her suck on it. "I got the food and bottle from Samantha's daycare, so you didn't feel all alone. Samantha misses you." After Lucy's lunch, Catherine had to go. Catherine promised to pick her little girl up right after school since Jessica carpooled to and from her school with a friend everyday. Lucy went back into school, where the worst was yet to come.
12111111111111111111111111.title: Continue 1

121111111111111111111111111.content:
Lucy was in her second to last period class when she felt it. She had to poop. Really bad. She raised her hand, but before she could get the teacher to see it, she had started filling her diaper. "Lucy, what is it?" Lucy said it was nothing, but then the girl behind her chipped in saying, "Ewwww! I bet she had to go to the bathroom, until she went in her pants!" The whole class laughed and Lucy got up in embarrassment and ran to the door, which was the wrong idea. One of the meaner girls put her foot out and Lucy tripped on it. She started to fall but caught herself on a chair. Unfortunately, this movement made her skirt fly up and revealed her filling diaper to the entire class. They roared with laughter and even the teacher couldn't control them. Lucy continued to run and eventually burst out of the school and into the near woods. Her mother was called when she couldn't be found. Catherine was enraged at her daughter's treatment, but she was more concerned about her safety. Jessica even came to look. Ultimately, it was Samantha who found her, knowing that Lucy had a favorite tree she hid under in the forest. She was found curled into a ball crying her eyes out and saying how it wasn't fair and that she wasn't a high schooler. She got hugs all around and a tearful Samantha wouldn't let her go. "See!! 12531.content:
Faye had always wanted to be a model. She had sent pictures of herself to every modeling firm, but so far had not received any responses. Secretly, Faye also wanted to wear and use diapers, although she never worked up the courage to do so, fearing she would get caught and mocked by her friends and family, so she only read diaper stories on the internet and looked longingly at pictures of women in diapers in secret. Faye did not lose hope, though. She started going to community college to learn how to design clothing and somehow become part of the modeling world that way.

One day while the tall, long-haired blonde girl was coming home from class, she saw a strange woman at her front door. The woman was tall, taller than Faye, with short brown hair and an innocent smile.
"Oh, I was beginning to worry no one lived here. You're Faye, right?" The woman said.
Faye nodded.
"Yes, I'm Faye. What brings you here?" Faye asked, curiously.
The woman extended her hand and shook hands with Faye.
"I'm Brittany from D'Per Agency Modeling. Our recruitment office got ahold of some of your pictures and we think you would be a GREAT addition to our stable of models!" The woman said.
Faye laughed and smiled, overjoyed at this news.
"Thank you! Thank you! I don't remember sending a D'Per Agency, though." Faye said.
Brittany smiled.
"Well, we were forwarded your application from another source that didn't want you. In case you didn't know... God it's so awkward to tell people this... We mostly model underwear." Brittany said.
Faye smiled.
"That's good, I have the body for modeling underwear." The blonde girl said.
"...Disposable underwear." Brittany added.
Faye smiled ever wider. She even laughed a little.
"What, like diapers?" Faye said.
"...Yeah. You're still interested, right?" Brittany asked.
"Of course I am! I... I would've applied here if I had known you existed. Thank you!" Faye said.

12533222121111111111221321.content:
Soon, they arrived in the throne room of Twilight's castle.

The other members of the Mane 6 were assembled there. So were Spike, Starlight Glimmer, Trixie, and - interestingly - Sunset Shimmer. Alice was surprised to see Sunset there, but not displeased; she loved Sunset. Maybe the amber Unicorn was simply visiting or something.

As they gradually approached the thrones and map table, Alice became more aware of her nudity. She was compelled to cover her bare breasts with her arms, but she resisted the urge. After all, apart from Twilight, Sunset was the only one who had ever seen humans before, and she had BEEN one much longer than Twilight had.

By the time they reached the table, everyone had noticed the lavender mare, the orange stallion, and the diapered girl. None of them said a word, but a couple seemed astonished.

When they reached the thrones, Twilight announced "Girls - and Spike - I'd like you to meet, Alice. Flash and I just adopted her as our daughter."

Some of the others seemed stunned.

Sunset Shimmer was the first to speak. "Are you-?"

"A human?" Alice finished for her. As the amber mare nodded, Alice said "Yes. Nice to meet you all."

Right then, the others began to crowd Alice and fawn over her.

"Pleased to meet you, sugar cube!" said Applejack

"My gosh, she's sooooo cute!" Pinkie Pie squealed.

"Welcome to Equestria." Fluttershy mumbled softly

"That's a lovely diaper you have, darling," Rarity observed, "I should think of making something like that sometime."
